bal.bloqueado: Sorry, You Have The Economy Locked for some reason.

crime.title: 🕵️‍♂️ Crime
crime.bloqueado: You have the Economy Locked. Contact the support server to appeal.
crime.crime: You have received {crime} for stealing from the owner, correeee
crime.noCrime: ❌ It seems you don't know how to quietly enter the places and they took you away {money}.
crime.cooldown: 🛑 | Stop! Wait `{time}` to commit a crime again.
crime.error: ❌ Sorry, it seems that there was an error adding the money. We are working to repair it.

daily.dlyUser: You just gave {money} to user {miembro}! Come back in {tiempo} for your daily money.
daily.dly: You just received {money}! Come back in {tiempo} for your daily money.

daily.bloqueado: You have the Economy Locked. Contact the support guild to appeal.

rob.title: 🕵️‍ Steal
rob.noProfile: This user does not have a profile, he has not sent any message to register it.
rob.bloqueado: You have the Economy Locked. Contact the support guild to appeal.
rob.noRobMoney: How do you want to steal it if it has nothing?
rob.mensaje: ✅ Successful theft You have stolen {miembro} the total of {robado}. Now run away while you can.
rob.noMensaje: ❌ The law struck you by surprise and took you away {money}, besides they gave half of that to {miembro} for the incident.
rob.cooldown: 🛑 | Stop! Wait `{time}` to steal from someone else.
rob.error: ❌ Sorry, it seems there was an error. We are working to repair it.

slotmachine.mensaje3: They take {money} from you for not getting anything.

trade.title: 💎🏬 Trade
trade.bloqueado: You have the Economy Locked. Contact the support guild to appeal.

trade.noMensaje: ❌ It looks like the police saw you and took you away {money}.

trans.title: 💱 Transfer
trans.noMencion: Mention not valid. Verify the user.
trans.automencion: ✅ {money} coins successfully transferred to the national bank of StarLight. Thanks for your preference.
trans.mensajeEspera:
Verify and accept by placing `{numero}` to transfer {dinero} coins. Set `cancel` not to transfer money.
*You have a 10% commission for the transfer.*
trans.bloqueado: You have the Economy Locked. Contact the support guild to appeal.
trans.noMoney: It seems you have no money to transfer.
trans.falta: You do not have enough coins.
trans.noSumar:
It seems that {miembro} It has no profile. **He has to talk to be believed**
*If you think this is a mistake, you can report it with* `bugreport`
trans.mensaje: ✅ Successful transfer It was given to {miembro} the amount of {cantidad}
trans.error: ❌ Sorry, it seems there was an error. We are working to repair it.
